about

a bit of the professional
who speaks to you

My name is Leo Amaral, i’m a freelance front-end developer and UI designer based in Goiânia, Brazil.
I have 4 years of experience at the development of fast and usual digital products, websites and landing pages.

An autodidact developer with strong background on design, currently focused on craft digital experiencies that go beyond simple pages, and really help ambitious brands grow.

I worked in great digital agencies, and more recently in the development of systems for startups.

Also, i’m releasing some side projects in 2019.

fully available

for freelance and full-time opportunities
